thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie
thread.title: Barbour,Ms Bernadette

author: Barbour,Ms Bernadette
title: Barbour,Ms Bernadette
text: My winter bills are significantly lower than last year (with a different provider). I also loved the 150 credit for joining which really helped during the winter months. Bills are very comprehensive and I like that whilst I am with Energia for both gas and electric, I get billed separately with some time apart that saves me an overdraft and fees for same in the bank. Takes a lot of the stress of bills away.
